full: Manatees are also known as, sea cows.
Manatees have a mass of up to 550 kilograms.
Manatees have a good long-term memory.
Manatees are herbivores and eat over 60 different freshwater and saltwater plants.
The freshwater Amazonian manatee inhabits the Amazon River and its tributaries.
The main causes of death for manatees are human-related issues, such as habitat destruction.
Manatees are listed by the World Conservation Union as vulnerable to extinction.
From manatee hides, Native Americans made war shields, canoes, and shoes.
Native Americans ground the bones to treat asthma and earache.
In 1893, hunting of manatees was banned in the United States.
